alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 15 at 4:44AM MST until January 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM THIS MORNING... ...SECOND WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...The Beaverhead Lemhi highlands, Centennial Mountains, and Island Park region, including but not limited to Dubois, Monida Pass, Island Park, Raynolds Pass, and Targhee Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 AM this morning, and again from midnight tonight to 9 AM Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
